title: Braised chicken with mushroom and lemon sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '4 skinned, boned chicken breasts, about 125 g (4½ oz) each', 'Salt and black pepper', 'Juice of 2 lemons', '150 g (5½ oz) mushrooms, quartered', '125 ml (4 fl oz) chicken stock', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme or marjoram', '6 spring onions, finely chopped', 'To garnish: a few sprigs of fresh thyme']
